title: 1 Rp riot please
body:
Twas the night before Christmas and all through the rift,
No summoners trash talking, (even you doublelift)
For the mood was now changing for one reason alone,
"Winter Wonder Orianna" (in an orgasmic groan). 

The rift was now buzzing, all full of glee
Well almost everyone, all accept me
Upon opening the client, how could it be
In that top right hand corner, showed 974 rp......

:((( riot plz

replies.body: If you send them an email they'll do it for you. You can only do it one time though. I had 7 rp added to my account for Night Hunter Ebola.
To this day. I still wonder if he ever got that 1 Rp {{item:3070}}
Cmon Rito, tis the season, or if not take 1 rp from me and give it to him :)
I woul support you, but it is for the skin that looks like Venus Angelic, and that is disgusting.
That is epic,  come on Riot, help this guy out.
RIOT ..... HELP HIM... HE AMAZING AT POEMS....
Great Poem! So rito, help a guy out (Early Christmas present for him) :(
nice poem, except the orgasm part
